summary.para: Called when system-allocated frame buffers are sent to the device driver.

param.name: pCallbackAttributes
param.para: The attributes containing the callback data. The System-allocated frame buffer information is stored in the attribute with the MF_DMFT_FRAME_BUFFER_INFO key.

param.name: pinId
param.para: The identifier of the device pin to which the frame buffers are sent.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: The frame buffer header information provided by this callback is read-only. You should not try to allocate, deallocate, open, or close anything within the header.

summary.para: Implement this callback to receive notifications when system-allocated frame buffers are sent to the device driver.
